text: Spencer Abraham (born June 12, 1952) is an American politician. He represented Michigan in the United States Senate from 1995 until 2001. He was the 10th United States Secretary of Energy. He is a Republican. Abraham was born on June 12, 1952 in East Lansing, Michigan. He graduated from Michigan State University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1974. Abraham received his J.D. degree from Harvard Law School in 1979. He is married to Jane Abraham. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography NGR * Spencer Abraham Chairman & CEO Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Michigan Category:United States Secretaries of Energy Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:American Eastern Orthodox Christians
title: Spencer Abraham
